idea:
MATHURESH PACKAGING SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

We are manufacturers of ecofriendly paper and cloth carry bags.
Our aim is to provide our customers with a range of nature-friendly options in carry bags in place of  non-biodegradable plastic/non-woven packing and carry bags.
We also strive to help the weaker sections of the society by generating employment through manufacturing the bags.
name: MATHURESH PACKAGING SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
